channel.title: Hey i have a problem
channel.description: ok so in photoshop i try and change my colors to lets say blue and i click on the blue color click ok and over in the sidde tthing where it shows the colors you picked it changes to gray instead of blue and every other color i pick does the same thing anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: Hey i have a problem
item.dc:creator: @pistolbob pistolbob
item.description:
@pistolbob wrote:

yea but the wierd thing is when i downloaded mr chrises thing to learn from it let me change it but when i minimized the thing went back to grey closed out and went back in still happens.[br][size=1]Posted at: July 07, 2006, 11:34:01 PM[/size][hr]lol nvm im stupid when ever i would make a new document i had it set for grayscale instead of rgb or whatever thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Hey i have a problem
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

I think this happened to me too. If you have two projects up, try closing one, and if not, have the project up, not minimized.

Hope that works

Read full topic
